group_1.textRight: Please calm yourself, Princess!

group_1.textLeft: You can't ask that of me!
Are you not enraged?! How dare they suggest@our sacred tree be struck down!
And without our permission at that!

group_1.textRight: Lord Masatsuna!@Please rein in the princess!
What's going on?
Milord!

group_1.textLeft: Somebody fetch me my naginata!@I shall fight alone if I must!

group_1.textRight: This is bad…!
Yes! You must calm her! When the princess says@she'll do something, nothing will stop her!
Tsuyu! Steady your mind for a moment!
We're no match for them in strength.@We must formulate a plan.
Your thoughtless actions will be the death@of our clan!

group_1.textLeft: …Mmph!
…My apologies.@I don't know what came over me…

group_1.textRight: I shall be having an all-hands meeting@to come up with a way forward.
For now, you ought to retire to your room@until you regain your composure.

group_1.textCenter: …Father! I'd like to discuss something@with you!

group_1.textRight: Speak.

group_1.textLeft: I need some rumors to reach Lord Sumiya...

group_1.textRight: First Tsuyu, and now Lord Masatsuna.@We've had many guests from Mizuna lately.

group_1.textLeft: No need for formalities.@We've known each other for ages.

group_1.textRight: I already know why you're here.@This is about the sacred tree.

group_1.textLeft: You have a keen ear.

group_1.textRight: In these parts, words reach your ear whether@you want to hear them or not.

group_1.textLeft: Since you know the story, I'll cut to the point.
Can we ask Suitoku to assist us in stopping@Lord Sumiya?

group_1.textRight: You and your daughter have a knack@for difficult questions…
Considering we receive favor from Sumiya,@it would be difficult for us to support you.

group_1.textLeft: …Then can you at least help us spread@some rumors?

group_1.textRight: Rumors?

group_1.textLeft: Indeed.
Lord Sumiya has become strangely devout@in his old age.
If we spread word about divine punishment,@he might believe it.

group_1.textRight: Although spreading false rumors would@leave me ill at ease…
What story do you have in mind?

group_1.textLeft: He who fells our sacred tree shall be punished@by our god and cursed by our ancestors.
Lord Sumiya, who hails from beyond our land,@should instead venerate our god…

group_1.textRight: Hmm… Did Tsuyu come up with this?

group_1.textLeft: How did you guess?

group_1.textRight: I've heard many such stories.@I recall her telling me one like it.
It will hurt nothing as long as I make it clear@it is but a mere rumor.

group_1.textLeft: So…?

group_1.textRight: I'll say the ancestral spirit responsible for this@curse is known as the Lady of Mizuna.

group_1.textLeft: Very good.
Given her poor temper, the Lady of Mizuna would@indeed be likely to trifle with Lord Sumiya.

group_1.textRight: *Chuckle*
Give me time and I'll ensure Lord Sumiya@learns of this tale.

group_1.textLeft: We thank you for your kind consideration.
Even though he's heard the rumors,
Lord Sumiya still intends to cut down@the sacred tree…

group_1.textRight: So it seems…

group_1.textLeft: Very well.
I must go out and fight as the heiress of Mizuna@so that we retain our honor.

group_1.textRight: Please stop! You'll bring ruin to our clan!

group_1.textLeft: If we lose the sacred tree, our souls are as good@as ruined anyway.
At that point, we may as well bow our heads@and be killed.
I wish to die with pride!

group_1.textRight: You mustn't!
